name: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science
overview: This program provides comprehensive training in computer science fundamentals, algorithms, and software engineering. Students gain hands-on experience through projects and internships with leading tech companies.
requirements: Strong background in mathematics and physics

name: Master of Business Administration
overview: An intensive MBA program focusing on Asian business practices and global management strategies. The curriculum includes case studies, consulting projects, and networking opportunities with industry leaders.

name: Bachelor of Science in Physics
overview: This program explores fundamental and applied physics with access to state-of-the-art research facilities. Students can participate in cutting-edge research in quantum physics, astrophysics, and materials science.
requirements: High school diploma with strong physics and mathematics grades

name: Master of International Relations
overview: This graduate program examines global politics, diplomacy, and international cooperation with a focus on Asia-Pacific region. Students engage with policy practitioners and conduct field research.

name: Bachelor of Medicine
overview: A comprehensive medical program combining theoretical knowledge with clinical practice at affiliated hospitals. Graduates are prepared for medical licensing examinations and specialized training.

name: Bachelor of Economics
overview: This program provides rigorous training in economic theory, econometrics, and policy analysis. Students develop analytical skills applicable to finance, consulting, and public policy careers.
requirements: High school diploma with mathematics proficiency

name: Master of Engineering in Robotics
overview: An advanced program in robotics and automation, covering AI, mechatronics, and human-robot interaction. Students work on real-world projects in collaboration with industry partners.

overview: This comprehensive law program covers Japanese and international legal systems with emphasis on comparative law. Students develop critical thinking and analytical skills for legal practice or further study.

overview: This program addresses global environmental challenges through interdisciplinary research in ecology, climate science, and sustainability. Field work and laboratory research are integral components.
